DOC.brief_summary: The study evaluate refine breast screen diagnosis device .
DOC.brief_title: Combined Digital X-ray Ultrasound Technique Improved Detection Characterization Breast Lesions
DOC.detailed_description: The device produce 3-D mammogram ultrasound picture breast time position . This help make sure area mammogram easily find ultrasound use new device . The 3-D mammogram provide good visualization suspect lesion improve diagnostic accuracy .
DOC.criteria: To participate research study must female age 25 Have normal mammogram schedule breast biopsy Have cyst recommend 6 month follow mammogram biopsy . Male Under age 25 Documented breast cancer
